pageContext.description: Palstave: edge very blunt and half missing; no trace of loop: shallow depression apparent on each face just below stop-ridge; very low flanges; butt broken and chipped. The whole surface is in very bad condition, being very rough and having list all definiteness of [arthsic].
pageContext.collection: N.W. 1938,H.D. Goulding of Rothfield, Sussex,1978" H. Duncan Goulding, Heathfield House, Town Row, Rotherfield - he never owned the piece, just broght it in the B.M. He is trying to chase it up but owner is getting old.,Info. from Fiona Marsden, Lewes Museum
pageContext.site: England, east sussex,crowborough,luxford farm,2' under sandy soil,see b" o.s. sussex xvii, s.w.,person who found it was working for the waterboard and was laying a main
